Name: Golden Pond
Details:
Golden Pond Retirement Community has been an active member of the Golden community since 2004 and offers 114 units of Independent Living, Assisted Living and Memory Care. Golden Pond is a locally and independently owned senior living community in Golden, Colorado. The Executive Director brings years of experience in the management of Senior Living Communities, Assisted Living and Long Term Care facilities. We also offer and facilitate an easy transition to higher levels of care if needed.

Golden Pond is an upscale community where our residents can live their lives to their highest potential while providing top-tier care, activities, and dining.
Most of our residents will make Golden Pond their final home, and we pride ourselves on our resident satisfaction rate in excess of 98%.

Name: Healthy at Home
Info: In-Home Care You Can Trust. ‚ÄîRight here in Colorado
Details:
Healthy at Home is a Colorado-based in-home senior care provider dedicated to delivering personalized healthcare services to seniors within the comfort of their own homes. Their comprehensive offerings include skilled nursing care, physical, occupational, and speech therapy, as well as personal care services such as assistance with daily living activities. By collaborating closely with physicians, Healthy at Home develops tailored care plans that address each client's unique health needs, promoting independence and enhancing quality of life.

The organization emphasizes a holistic approach to senior care, integrating spiritual support through non-denominational chaplain visits and connecting clients with community resources via medical social workers. Their commitment to compassionate, client-centered care ensures that seniors receive the necessary support to maintain their well-being while remaining in familiar surroundings.

Details: Senior Living Colorado is committed to assisting seniors and their families in finding ideal communities and resources to enhance their golden years within the state. The platform offers curated listings of premier senior living communities in areas such as Littleton, Arvada, Golden, and Broomfield. Additionally, it provides an events calendar featuring local gatherings and educational workshops, along with expert insights into the Front Range region, covering local attractions, healthcare options, and senior-friendly activities.

Name: Senior Summits
Info: Dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Tempor semper pretium sodales pharetra purus accumsan praesent odio facilisis.
Details:
The Senior Summit Series, initiated by Stage Senior, is a pivotal event series across Colorado's Front Range, dedicated to enhancing senior living for seniors, caregivers, and families. Each summit is hosted in different communities, offering diverse experiences and insights tailored to the unique needs of each locale.

The series provides comprehensive exploration through various stages of senior living, including:

  • Living Independently: Strategies and tools for seniors to continue living safely and comfortably in their own homes.
  • Home Modifications: Expert advice on making homes more accessible through smart renovations and technology.
  • Transition to Assisted Living: Insights on choosing the right time and place for moving to an assisted living facility.
  • Specialized Care Needs: Guidance on services and support for advanced needs, focusing on memory care and nursing care.
  • End-of-Life Care: Compassionate approaches to hospice care, ensuring comfort and dignity.

By attending the Senior Summit Series, participants gain the expertise and support needed to navigate these stages with confidence, making informed decisions about their care or the care of loved ones.

Details:
Stonebridge Assisted Living & Memory Care, located in Arvada, Colorado, offers comprehensive assisted living and memory care services. The community emphasizes independence and dignity for its residents, providing personalized care plans, 24-hour supervision, and assistance with daily activities to ensure a supportive environment tailored to individual needs.

The facility features a variety of amenities designed to enhance residents' quality of life, including a game room, library, fitness center, and wellness programs. Residents can participate in diverse activities such as movie nights, music programs, and social outings, fostering engagement and social interaction. The neighborhood's proximity to healthcare facilities, pharmacies, and local cafes further contributes to a convenient and enriching living experience.

Name: The Gardens at Columbine
Info: Assisted Living and Memory Care in Littleton Colorado
Details:
The Gardens at Columbine offers 124 units of Assisted Living and Memory Care in two separate buildings. Located at Platte Canyon and Ken Caryl Avenue in Littleton, Colorado this community was built in 2000 and expanded to add memory care in 2015. The name speaks for itself when you walk the grounds of this community where an abundance of gardens, water features and artwork meander through more than 2 acres. The memory care community at The Gardens at Columbine is one of the most beautiful (and thoughtfully designed) memory care communities in the state.

Our professional staff is dedicated to ensure your loved one receives the highest quality of personalized care available. Many of our care staff and directors have been with The Gardens for many years, some since our inception. We believe that each resident should expect to continue an enriching lifestyle. Our role at The Gardens at Columbine is to provide a place that feels just like home as we support independence for our residents.

Name: The Gardens on Quail
Info: Arvada Assisted Living and Memory Care
Details:
The Gardens on Quail Retirement Community has been an active member of the Arvada community since 2012 and offers 83 units of Assisted Living, and a secure environment for Memory Care. We strive to maintain strong relationships and connections to the community and promote relationships between our residents and the local Arvada schools, churches, businesses, and non-profit organizations.

We provide our residents with a high-quality, active lifestyle based on the different care levels our community offers. We also offer and facilitate an easy transition to higher levels of care if needed. The Gardens on Quail is an upscale, custom-designed community where our residents can live their lives to their highest potential while being provided with top-tier care, activities, and dining.

Supportive services including concierge physicians, home health, on-site audiology, podiatry, and hospice care can be utilized community-wide.
